column2: SELECT Top # ph.ra, ph.dec, n.objID, n.neighborObjID into MyDB.redmappermatch1 FROM MyDB.redmapper1 as p, Neighbors n Join PhotoObjAll ph ON ph.objID = n.objID WHERE n.distance < p.#SearchRadius and ph.petroMag_i< p.#i and /*make sure objects found are galaxies*/ n.type = # and n.neighborType = # and /*Primary objects*/ n.mode = # and n.neighborMode = # and /*added as a test to try and get the data centered at current redmapper data*/ ph.ra = p.ra and ph.dec = p.#dec
